roleset.name: like snorkelling

example.name: internet example with location
example.text: Start off by skin-diving in a swimming pool or calm water.
example.arg: in a swimming pool or calm water.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: They gathered oysters in the shallows, skin-dived for them, or collected them in wire dredges towed behind sailing boats.

roleset.note: SKINDIVE-V NOTES: Roleset added based on example from Brown Corpus. No Vncls. Comparison to 'dive' (from skindive.01-v)
No examples have been found suggesting args1 or 2 can appear as core args. (from skindive.01-v)
